summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CR Department Appointment System. Backend APIs working excellent with 94.7% success rate. Frontend authentication, navigation, and role-based access working properly. All major features tested successfully.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 when creating appointments
minor_bugs.impact: Minor HTTP status code issue - functionality works correctly

frontend_issues.role_based_access_working: CRM and CRE role restrictions properly enforced
frontend_issues.forms_working: New Appointment form renders with all required fields

passed_tests: Authentication endpoints for CRM and CRE users
Appointments API - GET, POST, PUT operations
Login page loads with Google Sign In button
Dashboard page renders correctly when authenticated
Day View page renders appointments grouped by branch
Month View page renders with filters and appointment list
New Appointment form has all required fields
Settings page accessible with proper UI for CRM users
User Management page accessible for CRM users
Role-based access properly restricts CRE from Settings/Users pages
CRE Dashboard properly hides CRM-specific buttons
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Update appointment creation endpoint to return 201 status code instead of 200. All other functionality working correctly.

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (Authentication, navigation, forms, role-based access all working)
